Posts.Content: Great idea. I find it massively helpful to hear from others with glioblastoma (I was diagnosed in January 2016) as well as from people living with other conditions. What's really good is the readership: this will reach people who may not themselves be living with a disease, but are looking at how to keep people like us around for the long haul! Great stuff.
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices
